DataElement.preferredName: Molecular Analysis Laboratory Procedure Biospecimen Collection Performed Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The month, day, and year the molecular analysis biospecimen collection was performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Molecular Analysis Laboratory Procedure Biospecimen Collection Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A laboratory procedure that involves the study of tissues, cells, and fluids using DNA/RNA analysis techniques for the identification of characteristics and abnormalities at the molecular level._Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting._The act or process of gathering biospecimens for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes._Executed and carried through to completion.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Molecular Analysis Laboratory Procedure Biospecimen Collection
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A laboratory procedure that involves the study of tissues, cells, and fluids using DNA/RNA analysis techniques for the identification of characteristics and abnormalities at the molecular level.:Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.:The act or process of gathering biospecimens for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes.

Concepts.definition: A laboratory procedure that involves the study of tissues, cells, and fluids using DNA/RNA analysis techniques for the identification of characteristics and abnormalities at the molecular level.
Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.
The act or process of gathering biospecimens for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes.
Executed and carried through to completion.
